heroSubtitle:
Co-op games
like you've never seen before.
heroDescription: Nexus: a co-op game that will push your intuition to the limit.
nexusIntro: NEXUS is DraQu's first portal: a cooperative card challenge with elemental magic and decisions under pressure.
nexusGoal: Your goal: cooperate, read the table, and complete the mission.
nexusFeature1Desc: Information is shared and success is shared too.
nexusFeature2Desc: Plan carefully; every card changes the table.
nexusFeature3Desc: You can't say everything. Every word counts.
nexusFeature4Desc: Elements and dragons give the portal its identity.
nexusFeature5Desc: Risk, timing, and coordination define the run.
languagesDescription: Languages at launch: target 29 on Steam.
languagesNote: The final list will be confirmed on the Steam page.
featuresDesc: A cooperative card challenge with elemental magic and decisions under pressure.
cooperativeDesc: Information is shared and success is shared too.
dragonDesc: Elements and dragons give the portal its identity.
magicDesc: You can't say everything. Every word counts.
discordSubtitle: Follow development, share feedback, and help shape the roadmap.

tagline: DraQu is a cooperative tavern of card-based missions, starting with the NEXUS portal in Q1 2026.
notFoundDescription: The dragon breathed too much fire and broke the page.
privacyIntro: At DraQu Studios, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, protect, and share your information when you use our website, games, and services.
privacyInfoCollectedText: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, sign up for newsletters, or contact us. This may include your name, email address, and gameplay preferences. We also automatically collect certain information about your device and usage patterns through cookies and similar technologies.
privacyHowWeUseText: We use your information to provide and improve our services, communicate with you about updates and events, analyze usage patterns, ensure security, and comply with legal obligations. We never sell your personal information to third parties.
privacyDataProtectionText: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Your data is stored on secure servers and transmitted using encrypted connections.
privacyUserRightsText: Under the GDPR and other applicable laws, you have the right to access, rectify, erase, restrict processing, data portability, and object to processing of your personal data. You can also withdraw consent at any time. To exercise these rights, contact us at altf4studio.official@gmail.com.
privacyCookiesText: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience, analyze usage, and provide personalized content. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings. For more information, see our Cookies Policy.
privacyChangesText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We'll notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on our website and updating the effective date. Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
privacyContactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, contact us at altf4studio.official@gmail.com.
termsIntro: Welcome to DraQu Studios! These Terms of Service govern your use of our website, games, and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.
termsAcceptanceText: By accessing or using DraQu Studios services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, do not use our services.
termsUseOfServiceText: You may use our services only for lawful purposes. You agree not to use our services to violate laws, infringe the rights of others, distribute harmful content, or engage in any behavior that could harm our services or reputation.
termsUserContentText: You are responsible for all content you submit and your conduct while using our services. You grant us a non-exclusive license to use, modify, and display your content in connection with our services. We reserve the right to remove content that violates these terms.
termsEarlyAccessText: Our games may be offered in early access or beta versions. These versions are incomplete and may contain errors or bugs. We make no guarantees about the functionality or performance of early access content.
termsIntellectualPropertyText: All content, features, and functionality of our services are owned by DraQu Studios and are protected by intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our written permission.
termsLiabilityText: To the maximum extent permitted by law, DraQu Studios will not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of our services.
termsGoverningLawText: These terms are governed by the laws of the jurisdiction where DraQu Studios is based. Any dispute will be resolved through binding arbitration or in the courts of that jurisdiction.
termsContactText: For questions about these Terms of Service or to report violations, contact us at altf4studio.official@gmail.com.
cookiesPolicyIntro: This Cookies Policy explains how DraQu Studios uses cookies and similar technologies on our website and services. By continuing to use our services, you consent to our use of cookies as described in this policy.
cookiesWhatAreText: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites remember your preferences, analyze traffic, and provide personalized experiences. Cookies do not contain personally identifiable information.
cookiesEssential: Essential cookies: Required for basic website functionality, including security features and user authentication.
cookiesAnalytics: Analytics cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website so we can improve the user experience.
cookiesPreferences: Preference cookies: Remember your settings such as language preference and personalization options.
cookiesManageText: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to view, delete, and block cookies. However, disabling certain cookies may affect website functionality and your user experience.
cookiesContactText: If you have questions about our use of cookies, contact us at altf4studio.official@gmail.com.
guidelinesIntro: Welcome to the DraQu community! These guidelines help maintain a positive and inclusive environment for all players and community members. By participating, you agree to follow these guidelines.
guidelinesBeRespectful: Be respectful: treat all community members with kindness and respect. Harassment, discrimination, or toxic behavior will not be tolerated.
guidelinesNoSpam: No spam or self-promotion: keep discussions relevant and avoid excessive self-promotion, spam, or off-topic content.
guidelinesProtectPrivacy: Protect privacy: don't share personal information about yourself or others. Respect everyone's privacy and boundaries.
guidelinesStayOnTopic: Stay on topic: keep discussions relevant to DraQu, games, and related topics. Use appropriate channels for different types of content.
guidelinesHelpOthers: Help others: support fellow community members, share knowledge, and contribute to a positive gaming environment.
guidelinesViolationsText: Violations of these guidelines may result in warnings, temporary suspensions, or permanent bans from our community platforms. We reserve the right to take appropriate action to maintain community standards.
guidelinesContactText: To report violations or concerns, contact our moderation team at altf4studio.official@gmail.com.
faqMetaDescription: DraQu FAQ: launch, availability, co-op, and languages.
faqIntro: Clear answers about what DraQu is today and what's coming.
faqQuote: "One developer. One tavern. One portal to begin."
faqWhenTitle: When does DraQu: The Awakening of the Elements release?
faqWhenAnswer: As soon as possible. I am developing the game on my own and, although it takes time, I'm putting all my care and effort into making it fun, playable, and magical from day one. I'd rather release it properly and have you love it than ship it half-finished.
faqWhereTitle: Where can I follow all the updates?
faqWhereAnswer: On our Discord. I'll share progress videos, game scenes, and internal tests there. Also, when we start posting updates on Steam, you'll see them there first.
faqWorldTitle: What can I expect from the game world?
faqWorldAnswer: We'll share more lore very soon, but here's a preview: the game is set in a world where dragons have taken control of the elements, and players must cooperate to restore balance in the Tavern of Elements. Each match will be a challenge against the forces that rule this universe.
faqSupportTitle: How can I support right now?
faqSupportAnswer: Add it to your Steam wishlist. It's free, it helps us a lot, and you'll get notified when it's ready to play.
nexusBullet2Desc: One mistake affects the whole team.
faqCoopAnswer: Yes. Designed for team play. You'll also have a solo practice mode with bots.
faqPlayableAnswer: Because we want you to play NEXUS as soon as possible and help us improve it with your feedback: balance, UX, bugs, and new content as the tavern grows.
faqLanguagesAnswer: 29 languages from launch on Steam (ES, EN, FR, and many more).
indieDescription: Wishlists and feedback help a lot.
nexusBullet3Desc: Magic and dragons in every match.
roadmapPageDescription: DraQu's roadmap: updates, improvements, and new portals.
roadmapWipDescription: We're preparing the roadmap. New dates, milestones, and portals are coming soon.
